summary: Razorpay payment integration testing completed successfully. All backend APIs working, frontend integration verified with Razorpay checkout modal opening correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Razorpay integration fully tested and working. Backend endpoints: /api/payment/razorpay/config (returns enabled=true, key_id), /api/payment/razorpay/create-order (creates Razorpay order), /api/payment/razorpay/verify (verifies payment signature). Frontend uses react-razorpay v3.0.1 with useRazorpay hook. Checkout flow: add to cart -> checkout -> fill form -> click Proceed to Payment -> Razorpay modal opens with Cards/Netbanking/Wallet/Pay Later options.

backend_api_tests.razorpay_create_order: PASS - Creates valid Razorpay order with order_* prefix
backend_api_tests.razorpay_verify_missing_details: PASS - Returns 400 for missing payment details

frontend_ui_tests.razorpay_modal_opens: PASS - Modal shows Cards, Netbanking, Wallet, Pay Later options
frontend_ui_tests.test_mode_indicator: PASS - 'Test Mode' banner visible in Razorpay modal
